title.rendered: Macallan 7 Year Old Armando Giovinetti Special Selection 1990s

excerpt.rendered:
A rarely seen special 7 Year Old Macallan bottled for Giovinetti & Figli exclusively for the Italian market.
Please note condition of outer box. Yellow patches due to age

Bottle size : 700
Distillery : Macallan
Age : 7
Vintage : 
ABV : 40.00%
